General.Name: Jinhui Liquor Co Ltd
General.Description: JINHUI LIQUOR Co.,Ltd. engages in the production and sale of liquor in China and internationally. The company also produces and sells water, beverages, daily necessities, beer, fruit wine, and related products. In addition, it engages in the sale of liquor packaging and auxiliary materials; and wholesale and sale of daily chemical products, tourist products and cultural products; prepackaged and bulk food; offers stationery, clothing, shoes and hats, textiles, electronic products, and communication products; wholesale and retail of equipment; sale of automobiles; ceremonial celebration services, exhibition and display services; and computer graphic design services. The company was incorporated in 2009 and is headquartered in Longnan, China.
